title: Content Management System (CMS)
subtext: Application non technical users can use to build projects with content
author: Coolzoa

description.title: CMS
texts: A Content Management System (CMS) is an application designed to help non technical users manage content and structure of applications, without the need for code.
A CMS is like a User Interface (UI), where non technical users can manage content without need for technical skills.
CMS examples are: WordPress, Drupal, AEM, Joomla!, and Shopify.
